body_html:
Tensorflow 1.10.1 works with cuda 10.0 and tensorRT5.0.0, Just compiled on Ubuntu 16.04 (python 3.5) and did some tests. But no cudnn7.3 at this point from Nvidia's download site so have to use cudnn7.2 .
Edited: just got updated to cudnn7.3, rebuilt TF1.10.1, still works.

Tensorflow 1.11.0RC1 didn't build but it might have nothing to do with cuda 10

body:
Tensorflow 1.10.1 works with cuda 10.0 and tensorRT5.0.0, Just compiled on Ubuntu 16.04 (python 3.5) and did some tests. But no cudnn7.3 at this point from Nvidia's download site so have to use cudnn7.2 .
Edited: just got updated to cudnn7.3, rebuilt TF1.10.1, still works.

Tensorflow 1.11.0RC1 didn't build but it might have nothing to do with cuda 10
